author: Simon Difford
description: Ripe pineapple, rich vanilla and honey laced with rum. The use of mead in this drink inspired the ‘Mediocre’ name.
name: Mediocre
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum (infused with vanilla)
7.5 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
